resources.string: All your lists have been backed up.
An error occurred while processing backup.
Select a folder where your lists will be backed up
â“˜ Try disabling and then re-enabling this option.
If enabled, your lists will be fetched from the backup files. This is useful if you sync your backup folder with other devices.
Each list is backed up every time you modify it. Click here to force a backup now.
Import a list from your filesystem (.1list file).\nIf the file is in your backup folder, the same file will be used for backups; if not, a new file will be created in your backup folder.
Error while importing your list : This file can\'t be imported.
